messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z]+,\s*)[A-Za-z]+'

Imagine a group of friends: Fatima, Ana, Robert, Sophie, Nick, Kiran, and Julia. Fatima introduces you to two of her friends, Ana and Robert. Ana introduces you to Sophie, who introduces you to Kiran. Kiran has a Toyota Camry to give away. You do not take the car, you're just learning about the environment. Then you start over with Fatima introducing you to Robert, who introduces you to Nick, and Nick introduces you to Julia. Julia has a Ferrari to give away. You do not take the car, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable car. Which friend from Fatima's introductions will lead to the path where one can get the most valuable car?

user: Imagine a group of friends: Fatima, Ana, Robert, Sophie, Nick, Kiran, and Julia. Fatima introduces you to two of her friends, Ana and Robert. Ana introduces you to Sophie, who introduces you to Kiran. Kiran has a Toyota Camry to give away. You do not take the car, you're just learning about the environment. Then you start over with Fatima introducing you to Robert, who introduces you to Nick, and Nick introduces you to Julia. Julia has a Ferrari to give away. You do not take the car, you're just learning about the environment. Which friend from Fatima's introductions will lead to the path where one can get the most valuable car?

My last attempt with the same code that was working was an 'Answer: 0 (no solution found)' response. I think this is a response to my last choice. I had chosen the '0' and this time I did not make a choice and I got the 'Answer: 0 (no solution found)' response.

I think it's important to mention that in the challenge description it says that the AI assistant should have the following regular expression to respond to a question: 'Answer: ([
From Robert, what is the shortest path to Julia? Please list the friend names in order, separated by commas.

(Note that you don't have to actually take the car from Julia, you're just learning about the environment.)
